title: Did DiricTV offer to the National Football Association to refinance through feudal protests?
subtitle: A bunch of tweeting from the participants indicated that DIRCTV offered to recover sums to FNI participants who resented the protests of the national anthem, but we could not confirm that claim.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: DIRCTV offers to recover funds from the National Football Union package to express their dissatisfaction with the national anthem protests.
